reviews.review: game for chilling. recommend for everyone

(I left this game on overnight, so the actual number of hours I've played is way less)

Portal 2 is a perfect sequel to arguably one of the most iconic games out there. It's an incredibly intuitive way to improve your puzzle-solving ability, and when that fails you, YouTube has your back. PLEASE try this game if you like challenging puzzles - the story, the puzzles, and the sheer addictiveness of this game are a steal at the low price it asks for.

One of the best videogames I have ever played, it's got good story, lovable characters, funny humor, amazing gameplay and great puzzles. I would 100% recommend this game if you don't know what to play.
